sph.vaadin.ui.svg

Interface SvgDots.DotListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener<String,SvgDots,Integer>, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    QuestionDots.QuestionDotListener
    Enclosing class:
    SvgDots

    public static interface SvgDots.DotListener
extends EventListener<String,SvgDots,Integer>
    SvgDotsListener interface for listening to SvgDots.Dot events fired by an SvgDots component.
    Since:
    11.10.2013
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sami Holck, Juha Mäkilä

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CLICK_EVENT
      click event (Fired whenever a dot has been clicked)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void on(String eventName, SvgDots canvas, Integer dotIndex)
      Called in response to a SvgDots.Dot event if the present listener is registered to listen for the given event.

    • Field Detail

      • CLICK_EVENT

        static final String CLICK_EVENT
        click event (Fired whenever a dot has been clicked)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • on

        void on(String eventName,
      SvgDots canvas,
      Integer dotIndex)
        Called in response to a SvgDots.Dot event if the present listener is registered to listen for the given event.
        Specified by:
        on in interface EventListener<String,SvgDots,Integer>
        Parameters:
        eventName - Name of the event.
        canvas - the source SVG canvas of the SvgDot Event.
        dotIndex - the index of the dot that triggered the event.
